languages.text: "Я верю, что благословенн{mf|ый|ая} {name} достаточно проницател{mf|ен|ьна}, чтобы распознать скверную натуру обитателей этого порочного места".

traits.locale_text: "Я верю, что благословенн{mf|ый|ая} {name} достаточно проницател{mf|ен|ьна}, чтобы распознать скверную натуру обитателей этого порочного места".

languages.text: "I have faith that the blessed {name} is perceptive enough to see the appalling nature of the residents of that depraved place."
languages.original_text: "Я верю, что благословенн{mf|ый|ая} {name} достаточно проницател{mf|ен|ьна}, чтобы распознать скверную натуру обитателей этого порочного места".

traits.locale_text: "I have faith that the blessed {name} is perceptive enough to see the appalling nature of the residents of that depraved place."
"I have faith that the blessed {name} is perceptive enough to see the appalling nature of the residents of that depraved place."
"I have faith that the blessed {name} is perceptive enough to see the appalling nature of the residents of that depraved place."
"I have faith that the blessed {name} is perceptive enough to see the appalling nature of the residents of that depraved place."
"I have faith that the blessed {name} is perceptive enough to see the appalling nature of the residents of that depraved place."

languages.text: 「私は{name}様を信じております。あの堕落した地の住民の性質は恐るべきものであると、ご理解いただくに足る洞察力を備えていると」
languages.original_text: "I have faith that the blessed {name} is perceptive enough to see the appalling nature of the residents of that depraved place."

traits.locale_text: 「私は{name}様を信じております。あの堕落した地の住民の性質は恐るべきものであると、ご理解いただくに足る洞察力を備えていると」

languages.text: “我相信，尊敬的{name}会看出这片堕落之地居民的邪恶本性，从而做出明智的判断。”
languages.original_text: "I have faith that the blessed {name} is perceptive enough to see the appalling nature of the residents of that depraved place."

traits.locale_text: “我相信，尊敬的{name}会看出这片堕落之地居民的邪恶本性，从而做出明智的判断。”

languages.text: «Tengo fe en que {mf|el bendito|la bendita} {name} es lo bastante perspicaz como para reconocer la espantosa depravación de los habitantes de ese lugar degenerado».
languages.original_text: "I have faith that the blessed {name} is perceptive enough to see the appalling nature of the residents of that depraved place."

traits.locale_text: «Tengo fe en que {mf|el bendito|la bendita} {name} es lo bastante perspicaz como para reconocer la espantosa depravación de los habitantes de ese lugar degenerado».

languages.text: « Je suis sûr que l'honorable {name} n'est pas aveugle à la nature répugnante des résidents de ce lieu de dépravation. »
languages.original_text: "I have faith that the blessed {name} is perceptive enough to see the appalling nature of the residents of that depraved place."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis sûr que l'honorable {name} n'est pas aveugle à la nature répugnante des résidents de ce lieu de dépravation. »

languages.text: "Ich vertraue darauf, dass {mf|der gesegnete|die gesegnete} {name} die abstoßende Natur der Bewohner dieses verderbten Orts durchaus wahrnimmt."
languages.original_text: "I have faith that the blessed {name} is perceptive enough to see the appalling nature of the residents of that depraved place."

traits.locale_text: "Ich vertraue darauf, dass {mf|der gesegnete|die gesegnete} {name} die abstoßende Natur der Bewohner dieses verderbten Orts durchaus wahrnimmt."

languages.text: "Kutsanmış {name}, bu azgın mekânın sakinlerinin dehşet verici fıtratını görecek ferasete sahiptir eminim."
languages.original_text: "I have faith that the blessed {name} is perceptive enough to see the appalling nature of the residents of that depraved place."

traits.locale_text: "Kutsanmış {name} da bu azgın mekânın sakinlerinin dehşet verici fıtratını görecek ferasete sahiptir eminim."
